title: Aatrox Teaser!

embed.description: Death and dust choke the air as a shadow takes shape. It is more ancient and evil than war. And it is growing. https://t.co/69pg7Y6I8M

body:
IT IS FINALLY HERE!

Youtube Mirror: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s8p_brCVNOA

replies.body: In Soviet Russia sword removes YOU from stone!
"Put your head down and play dead, you idiot!"
Rhaast is still the best Darkin tho. He calls Varus demon pants.

Rhaast is absolutely the best Darkin, but he doesn't have a lot of competition because he's the only Darkin who has good lines. Meanwhile Varus and Aatrox have only a handful of lines, several of which are outdated.

He's still the best Darkin though.

> [{quoted}](name=NotaRobot1006,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2018-06-11T16:55:36.468+0000)
>
> Rhaast is absolutely the best Darkin,

Not.

For.

Long.

Unless the new Aatrox can out-ham Rhaast, then Rhaast will always be the best Darkin.

Wait, actually, I don't think League could handle 2 loud, hammy Darkin.
pshh... prove it.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=000b00000001,timestamp=2018-06-12T04:12:19.993+0000)

> Not.
> 
> For.
> 
> Long.

Best Rioter In league now

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=000b00000001,timestamp=2018-06-12T04:12:19.993+0000)
>
> Not.
> 
> For.
> 
> Long.

what do you mean

aatrox was always the best darkin

its just so fun cus evreyone thinks youre playing a bad champ (hes been really good for a while now) and then you just decimate them

btw Rhaast

youre "just getting free"

Rhaast is never intimidating. It's like he is trying but failing miserably. I mean listen to this:

"They will die today. And the next...and the next."

or

"There will be blood on the walls and the floor...everywhere really."

Is he trying to be funny or stupid? Because i'm feeling both. Aatrox is obviously something far more menacing and horrifying than just a little red guy running around fucking shit up because it's fun.

Idk, i guess i like mature horror over playful horror.

Being trapped in a scythe for eons would leave one a little excited when they got out.

Or, y'know, maybe Rhaast is just one of those sadists who like to toy with their victims? Hard to say.

Plus, the demon pants line was great.

I understand that but Aatrox appears extremely dignified and drawn towards a purpose that is propably on a large scale considering his title is "World Ender".

As for sadism, i don't doubt that about Rhaast but Thresh, who is arguably a bigger expert on the matter shows less..Junkrat-style insanity.

From his description, which states he is "growing" and the fact that he gradually gets bigger and develops wings in the trailer, seems he will have an ult that makes him grow in size, like Nasus and Renekton, or maybe like Cho'gath. Or it might even be his passive (i.e. he gradually grows as there is more and more bloodshed around him).
Or it could be similar to his current ult...

I think it will be his current ult except not just free stats. Likely he'll get bonuses for each kill during the window. 

And considering the repeated nature of that downards slash, thats probably an ability. Most likely he can throw his sword out and return it on will as well.
Ah shit, Khorne's daemons starting to leak into the materium.
inb4 Bloodthirster Aatrox skin
Please see your nearest commissar!
Thank you for this comment good Sir.

Admittedly, he does look bad @$$.
Hopefully, his remake will go well.

well I guess he looks cool, to be honest I think his current visuals are completely fine, but I'll have to see the gameplay changes first.... I just want the old voice actor to be back... his voice is so chilling and elegant

Damn, with the recent trend in male champion reworks I expected him to be a fabulous winged sparkly vampire...

Edit: Sorry for the shitpost, I've been playing Hot Eurojank 2018 almost exclusively in the last few days in case you couldn't tell.

https://78.media.tumblr.com/fb141064fd6ab76efd74215d3e6045fd/tumblr_p8601vMeMI1qjztgpo1_400.gifv

What are you talking about? Could be something hotter than a bare chested demon of war and blood?
You can already hear the fans swooning and photoprinting posters to look in the lonely nights.

I was totally being serious...

Frankly it's a good thing Riot takes more care to preserve champion identities.
I was also being serious. Have you seen Tumblr since the Venom trailer?
I was just on Tumblr and I can confirm Aatrox is getting pretty much the same reaction.
Gonna be honest. I can only be so erect.
Guess he's gonna lose his identity of being *behind* the war and causing battles from the side lines by enraging people.

> Just when all hope seemed lost, Aatrox appeared among the ranks of the Protectorate. With but a few words, he urged the soldiers to fight to the last **before throwing himself into battle.** His presence inspired the desperate warriors. At first, they could only watch in awe as this unknown hero **cleaved through their enemies, his body and blade moving in unison as if one being.** Soon, the warriors found themselves imbued with a potent thirst for battle. They followed Aatrox into the fray, each fighting with the furious strength of ten until they had won a most unlikely victory.

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=00190001,timestamp=2018-06-11T20:32:06.411+0000)
>
> 

sounds like a support to me. new support aatrox confirmed?
He is quoting Aatrox's original lore, he was never meant to be a support and he's never going to be.

> [{quoted}](name=Zodiaxpert,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=0019000100000000,timestamp=2018-06-12T01:22:09.518+0000)
>
> He is quoting Aatrox's original lore, he was never meant to be a support and he's never going to be.

but bro. rylais that slow and you can have more slow with your slow.

Personally, old Aatrox was better. He wasn't overly bulky, his wings had a more interesting design, and his sword looked more painful and vicious than this one. Now, he's just another muscular fighter with a strange weapon.

I suppose only his updated voice-over remains to be heard, now. Hopefully it'll be an improvement.
After just seeing a glimpse of him you're already making judgments?

Yes, because this glimpse is, most likely, all there is to his appearance.

I'm hoping his in-game model proves me wrong, actually; if not, too bad.
They blatantly said they wanted to make him bulkier for gameplay clarity (I guess he'll build a bit tankier). Maybe he'll still be calm and elegant.
I did like his banner wings though

I must be seeing things.


I almost thought i saw a trailer that seems to prelude a Aatrox rework O_O

As if that could happen now xD

Man, he looks like something out of Doom! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
Music team doing themselves proud again. Bravo.
He's a pretty big guy.
Wow Im really glad with all these champions that are actually being made to look scary.  Meanwhile the epitome of fear {{champion:56}} looks like a fluffy bunny with blades on his arms.
My Baby!!! They reworking my Baby!!!
Rhaast still best Darkin.

inb4 he becomes the first actual AD infinite champion

Pyke with overgrowth doesn't count.

> [{quoted}](name=Beacon Academy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YewhqmAA,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2018-06-12T09:35:38.434+0000)
>
> Pyke with overgrowth doesn't count.

Does that actually do anything? I know you can increase his base HP with it but if he increases his bonus HP but his Bonus HP is always zero, surely you are just increasing Zero but 0.2%.

Agree on the first bit though, like Veiger but with AD, then he grows in size as the AD increased.

In the training tool, I went tank Pyke with cinderhulk and overgrowth

ended up with around 2471 hp (Which is his lv 18 HP), bunch of resistances, and every 8 minions would increase AD by 1

Totally not worth in a real game but lol

One day, I'll stop being lazy and go test if his hidden HP interacts with Titanic Hydra
technically, zed beat him to that, especially in a zed v Zed matchup.
lmao I never play blind pick xD
